metadata.name: The Kuma Fruit Fields
metadata.description:
Introducing Kuma's Fruit Fields, a delightful strategy and farming game developed in collaboration with Krypto Kumas, now available on Ethereum! Embark on an enchanting journey through the whimsical Tokuma Village, where you'll build and expand your very own Kuma Fruit Fields. Master farming, cooking, and crafting, while facing thrilling challenges that put your skills and strategy to the test. Progress through the game, build a bustling Kuma economy, and become the ultimate Kuma Fruit connoisseur!  
Play now on: https://pixygon.io/pixygonmicro/

More info about Krypto Kumas: https://kryptokumas.com/
